casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Isaiah GODWIN 331A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2019

Michele A. Goldman, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Godwin, David Isaiah

David Spence, Assistant District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of August 2019 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of August 2019."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 7th day of October 2019 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
